# Quickswim (Spell)
## Overview
[[Transmutation Spells|Transmutation]]

**Level:** [[1st Level Bard Spells|Bard 1]], [[1st Level Druid Spells|Druid 1]], [[1st Level Ranger Spells|Ranger 1]], [[Seafolk (Domain)|Seafolk]] 1, [[1st Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 1]], [[1st Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 1]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 2nd-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 2]], [[BoXM 2nd-Level Druid Spells List|Druid 2]], [[BoXM 2nd-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 2]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S, M/DF

**Range:** Personal

**Target:** You

**Duration:** 1 hour/level (D)

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** No

**Source:** Stormwrack (WotC), pg. 120

This spell increases your base swim speed by 10 feet; this adjustment counts as an enhancement bonus. It has no effect on other modes of movement, such as land speed, burrow, climb, or fly. If you do not have a swim speed, you gain no benefit from this spell.

*Arcane Material Component:* A scale from any fish.
